snippet: United Nations appeals judges ordered a new trial for two top aides of former President Slobodan Milosevic of Serbia, saying that they had been wrongfully acquitted in 2013.
abstract: United Nations judges order retrial for Jovica Stanisic and Franko Simatovic, two top aides of former Serbian Pres Slobodan Milosevic, saying they were wrongfully acquitted in 2013 of involvement in Balkan war crimes.
lead_paragraph: United Nations appeals judges ordered a new trial for two top aides of former President Slobodan Milosevic of Serbia, saying that they had been wrongfully acquitted in 2013.

headline.main: Hague Court Orders Retrial for 2 Aides to Milosevic
headline.print_headline: Hague Court Orders Retrial for 2 Aides to Milosevic

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
